lines.text: The biggest hicks in the world came from where I gew up.
What are you talking about? Where?
You're a good actor; an artist.
If you'd told me that ten years ago, I'd have agreed with you.
So that's what you've got. Talent, huh?
Every day's your birthday if you're a good friend of mine.
I always wanted to try a guy your size.

[to George Raft]
You've got to get a classy name. That 'George Raft' is too ordinary.
